questions.question: What is the traditional Timorese woven cloth called?

Which archetype is mentioned as emerging through creative self-expression?
Who wrote 'Women Who Run With the Wolves'?

Which activity is suggested as a way to express emotions non-verbally?
What concept did Carl Jung introduce that is mentioned in relation to creativity?

choices: To master a traditional art form
To connect traditional art with personal creativity
questions.answer: To connect traditional art with personal creativity

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a benefit of creativity in problem-solving?
choices: Leading to breakthroughs in various fields

questions.question: What does the star (Fitun) motif represent in Timorese tais?
According to the module, what is one way creativity contributes to personal empowerment?
What is the suggested duration for the stream of consciousness writing exercise?
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a traditional use for tais?
What does the module suggest about the relationship between creativity and the workforce?
choices: Creative skills are becoming less valuable
Creative thinking is only important in artistic fields
Creativity is increasingly valued in modern workplaces
Creativity has no impact on professional success
questions.answer: Creativity is increasingly valued in modern workplaces

questions.question: Which of the following is described as a benefit of incorporating creative activities into education?
choices: Enhanced learning outcomes and student engagement
questions.answer: Enhanced learning outcomes and student engagement

questions.question: What does the gecko (Teki) motif represent in Timorese tais?
According to the module, how can creativity help in dealing with trauma?
choices: By providing a distraction from painful memories
By offering a means to express emotions that are difficult to verbalize
questions.answer: By offering a means to express emotions that are difficult to verbalize

questions.question: What is the suggested word count for the reflection in the Creative Exploration Project?
Which quote about creativity is attributed to Dorothy Parker?
choices: Creativity is the power to connect the seemingly unconnected.
Creativity is a wild mind and a disciplined eye.
The creative adult is the child who survived.
To be creative means to be in love with life.
questions.answer: Creativity is a wild mind and a disciplined eye.

questions.question: What does the corn (Batar) motif symbolize in Timorese tais?
According to the module, how does engaging in creative activities relate to the concept of the Wild Woman archetype?
choices: It has no relation to the archetype
It allows connection with primal energy
It replaces the need for the archetype
questions.answer: It allows connection with primal energy

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of tais in Timorese culture?
choices: As a means of written communication
As a symbol of cultural identity and for ceremonial use
questions.answer: As a symbol of cultural identity and for ceremonial use

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a benefit of regular creative practice?

According to the module, how can creativity contribute to social progress?
What is the suggested starting prompt for the stream of consciousness writing exercise?
choices: When I feel most creative, I...
When I feel most wild and free, I...
If I could change one thing about the world, I would...
questions.answer: When I feel most wild and free, I...

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a traditional Timorese craft in the module?
According to the module, how does creativity relate to cultural preservation?
choices: It has no impact on cultural preservation
It serves as a conduit for preserving cultural heritage
It encourages the abandonment of cultural traditions
questions.answer: It serves as a conduit for preserving cultural heritage

questions.question: What does the module suggest about the relationship between creativity and personal healing?
choices: Creativity has no effect on personal healing
Creativity offers pathways to personal healing
Creativity should replace traditional healing methods
questions.answer: Creativity offers pathways to personal healing
